mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTE ( NOTE_IDX, NOTE_TITLE, NOTE_CONT, NOTE_REGDATE, SEND_USERCODE, RECEIVER_USERCODE, READMARK, DELNOTE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL( MAX(NOTE_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM NOTE), #{ submenu_id }, #{ board_title }, #{ board_cont }, (SELECT USERCODE FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{ userid }), (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD), (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD) )
